short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shun the western world and experience internet as our Glorious Leader intended it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the internet through Kim Jong-Un's eyes. This app will change all images to pre-approved pictures of our dear leader as well as playing beautiful North Korean battle music.
